message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you is $12000. Let me know if you're interested and we can move forward!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $10500 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to both of us. I look forward to your response.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $10800. I believe this is a reasonable compromise considering the product's value to both of us. Let me know if you're interested and we can finalize the deal!
